name: VEVOR 3-Piece Pipe Wrench Set, 10" 14" 18" Aluminum Straight Pipe Wrench, Adjustable Plumbing Wrench, with High Strength Jaw and Ergonomic Handle, Hangable Design, for Water Pipes, Automotive Repairs
short_description: Lightweight Wrench: Aluminum pipe wrench is 40% lighter than similar steel tools, making it easier to carry and less fatiguing during prolonged use, whether in workshop operations or outdoor maintenance.
Durable Construction: The pipe wrench head is forged from CRV alloy with a hardness of 52HRC, and heat-treated jaws enhance wear resistance and deformation resistance, extending its lifespan.

Easy Adjustment: The Non-slip knurled nut of the straight pipe wrench ensures smooth adjustments without slipping during single-handed operation. You can rotate the nut to adjust jaw size for various part dimensions. Self-cleaning thread design reduces contamination and wear, extending usability.

Ergonomic Design: H-shaped handle design of the plumbing wrench provides excellent weight distribution for easier handling and increased torque, allowing you to work more efficiently without excessive fatigue.

Wide Application: The set of 3 aluminum straight pipe wrenches in sizes 10 inches, 14 inches, and 18 inches is suitable for all your piping and mechanical needs. Ideal for tasks requiring fastening, loosening, or adjusting threaded connections in mechanical manufacturing, automotive repair, construction, and plumbing.

product_description: Product Description Experience strength and durability with a wrench unlike any other, the 14-inch RIDGID Aluminum Straight Pipe Wrench (catalog number 31095, model 814). Built to perform in the harshest jobsite conditions, this 14-inch straight pipe wrench accommodates all forms of pipe work with strength and accuracy with a pipe capacity of 2 inches. The full-floating forged alloy steel hook jaws provide maximum gripping power and quick ratcheting action during pipe adjustment jobs. Designed for ease of operation, the wrench features convenient self-cleaning threads as well as easily and quickly replaceable hook jaws, heel jaws, and spring assemblies. Constructed with high-quality aluminum and an easy to hold I-beam handle, it provides long-lasting strength and durability that can withstand heavy-duty and long-term use. This lightweight aluminum pipe wrench weighs only 2-1/2 pounds, making it approximately forty percent lighter than heavy-duty models while still offering all the same benefits.
